name: Harvey's Tiring Job
description:
How To Play:
- Left click and drag to plant seeds from the bag
- Left click and drag to drag vegetables back to the bag

Harvey spends his days cultivating his field but his bag is a real pain to handle... Help Harvey to better organize his seeds and plants in his bag and optimize his harvest !

Grab the seeds in the bag with your mouse and throw them in the corresponding plot, and drag the grown up plants in your bag to carry them back home.

Theme: Harvest
